input.sql: SELECT id FROM t_single UNION SELECT id FROM t_single_extend

output.sql: SELECT id FROM t_single UNION SELECT id FROM t_single_extend

input.sql: SELECT * FROM t_user JOIN t_user_extend ON t_user.id = t_user_extend.user_id WHERE t_user_extend.user_id = ?

output.sql: SELECT * FROM t_user_1 JOIN t_user_extend_1 ON t_user_1.id = t_user_extend_1.user_id WHERE t_user_extend_1.user_id = ?

input.sql: SELECT * FROM t_account WHERE amount=? OR amount=? AND account_id=?

output.sql: SELECT * FROM t_account_0 WHERE amount=? OR amount=? AND account_id=? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM t_account_1 WHERE amount=? OR amount=? AND account_id=?

input.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT id, content FROM t_user WHERE id = ? AND content IN (SELECT content FROM t_user_extend WHERE user_id = ?)) AS temp

output.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT id, content FROM t_user_1 WHERE id = ? AND content IN (SELECT content FROM t_user_extend_1 WHERE user_id = ?)) AS temp

input.sql: SELECT * FROM t_single s INNER JOIN t_config c ON s.account_id = c.account_id

output.sql: SELECT * FROM t_single s INNER JOIN t_config c ON s.account_id = c.account_id

input.sql: SELECT * FROM T_ROLE JOIN T_ROLE_ADMIN ON T_ROLE.ROLE_ID = T_ROLE_ADMIN.ROLE_ID WHERE T_ROLE_ADMIN.ROLE_ID = ?

output.sql: SELECT * FROM T_ROLE JOIN T_ROLE_ADMIN ON T_ROLE.ROLE_ID = T_ROLE_ADMIN.ROLE_ID WHERE T_ROLE_ADMIN.ROLE_ID = ?

input.sql: select * from t_account where amount=? and account_id=?

output.sql: select * from t_account_0 where amount=? and account_id=?

input.sql: SELECT account_id FROM t_account GROUP BY CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END ORDER BY CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END

output.sql: SELECT account_id , CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END AS GROUP_BY_DERIVED_0 FROM t_account_0 GROUP BY CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END ORDER BY CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END

SELECT account_id , CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END AS GROUP_BY_DERIVED_0 FROM t_account_1 GROUP BY CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END ORDER BY CASE WHEN account_id > 0 AND account_id <= 10 THEN '(0,10]' WHEN account_id > 10 THEN '(10,+∞)' ELSE '' END

input.sql: SELECT sharding_db.t_account.* FROM t_account WHERE account_id = ?

output.sql: SELECT t_account_0.* FROM t_account_0 WHERE account_id = ?

input.sql: SELECT sharding_db.t_account.account_id FROM t_account WHERE account_id = ?

output.sql: SELECT t_account_0.account_id FROM t_account_0 WHERE account_id = ?

input.sql: SELECT account_id FROM public.t_account WHERE account_id = ?

output.sql: SELECT account_id FROM public.t_account_0 WHERE account_id = ?

output.sql: SELECT account_id FROM public.t_account_0 WHERE account_id = ?
